Light mode: Viaturas form inputs have legible text (white bg, dark text) - PASSED

context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified: 1) Foto column is first in both Viaturas and Equipamentos tables, 2) obra_nome appears in movement history on detail pages, 3) Light mode inputs have proper text contrast. The app has 198 equipamentos, 22 viaturas, and 1 obra (Obra Teste).
